section1.title: Introduction
section1.content: Explore the world of AI and Machine Learning

sectionAbout.info.1: Hello! My name is Guilherme, I have a degree in Computer Engineering from the State University of Ponta Grossa (UEPG) and work as a full-stack developer. My expertise lies in developing robust backends using C#, while on the frontend I focus on delivering dynamic experiences with JavaScript and React.
sectionAbout.info.2: I have experience in developing APIs and process automation (RPA) and am currently directing my career towards areas such as MLOps and Artificial Intelligence. I believe that learning Cloud Computing is essential for this transition, and I am continuously seeking new ways to expand my technical and professional knowledge.

sectionExperience.description1.0: Development of robust backends using C#
